remarks: The support of a function in maps to notation with a set difference. (Contributed by AV, 28-May-2019.)
statement:
mptsuppdifd.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
mptsuppdifd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
mptsuppdifd.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. W ) $.
mptsuppdifd $p |- ( ph -> ( F supp Z ) = { x e. A | B e. ( _V \ { Z } ) } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d Z x $.
